Add a reusable proof bar component used twice
Reorder sections to: Hero → Proof bar → Problem/Solution → How it Works → Visibility/Audit
Restructure pricing into: (1) a short plan selector area, (2) the table/cards, (3) an incl
changes.rationale: Improves pricing comprehension by separating selection, comparison, and inclusions

changes.value: Introduce an audit-log UI pattern section: a fixed-height (~320px) scrollable log componen
Switch to 3 pricing cards on desktop (equal width) with one highlighted default tier (incr
changes.rationale: Card-based pricing with a default option is faster to parse

changes.value: Convert How-it-Works into a 3-step horizontal stepper on desktop and vertical stepper on m
changes.rationale: Creates a clear mental model of the workflow

changes.value: Use a single primary CTA and one secondary CTA in the hero
changes.rationale: Tightens the conversion path above the fold

changes.value: Utilize a neutral palette with high contrast ratios (4.5:1) for text and background combin...
changes.rationale: Ensures accessibility and enhances user confidence

changes.value: Use 16px body text with 1.5 line-height and max line length of 75ch for readability
changes.rationale: Enhances calm and clarity in text presentation

changes.value: Create a fixed-height (320px) scrollable audit log section with consistent typography and ...
Standardize border-radius to 8px across all components for consistency and a premium feel
changes.rationale: Creates a cohesive visual language throughout the interface

changes.value: Apply a subtle shadow (0px 2px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)) to elevate key components
changes.rationale: Adds depth and a premium touch to UI elements

changes.value: Implement a primary button with 20px padding, 4px border-radius, and subtle shadow effect
changes.rationale: Creates a premium feel while maintaining operational clarity

changes.value: Use 16px padding and 8px border-radius for card components to enhance safety and premium a...
changes.rationale: Improves visual comfort and perceived value

changes.value: Design proof chips with 12px font size and 20px padding, using color differentiation for c...
changes.rationale: Supports trust and safety messaging visually

issues.description: Hero CTA may not be visible above fold on mobile with 2-column→stack conversion
issues.rationale: 60/40 desktop grid stacking on mobile could push CTA below fold, killing conversion

issues.description: Pricing card highlighting may create false urgency without clear value differentiation
issues.rationale: Highlighted default tier without transparent reasoning reduces trust and creates friction

issues.description: Proof bar placement twice may feel repetitive and reduce credibility impact
issues.rationale: Overuse of social proof can signal desperation and decrease perceived authenticity

issues.description: Audit log 320px height may not show enough entries to demonstrate real activity
issues.rationale: Insufficient visible log entries could appear staged rather than authentic operational data

issues.description: Section reordering may break narrative flow from problem awareness to solution
issues.rationale: Moving proof before problem/solution disrupts natural buyer journey progression

issues.description: Single primary CTA may reduce conversion opportunities for different user intents
issues.rationale: Eliminating CTA options could miss users seeking demos, trials, or pricing information

issues.description: 3-step horizontal stepper may not accommodate complex workflow explanation
issues.rationale: Forcing complex process into 3 steps could oversimplify and reduce comprehension

issues.description: 8px border-radius may feel too rounded for business/enterprise positioning
issues.rationale: Overly rounded corners can appear consumer-focused rather than professional

issues.description: 75ch line length may be too long for scanning on wide desktop screens
issues.rationale: Longer line lengths increase cognitive load and reduce scannability for time-pressed users

issues.description: Pricing restructure into 3 sections may increase cognitive load during comparison
issues.rationale: Separating selection, comparison, and inclusions requires more mental effort to parse

suggestedFixes.fix: Ensure hero CTA remains above 600px viewport height on mobile with padding adjustments
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains conversion opportunity for mobile users who don't scroll immediately

suggestedFixes.fix: Add clear value proposition labels to highlighted tier explaining why it's recommended
suggestedFixes.rationale: Transparent reasoning for recommendations builds trust and reduces decision friction

suggestedFixes.fix: Use proof bar once in hero area and different trust element later (testimonials/logos)
suggestedFixes.rationale: Varied trust signals feel more authentic and comprehensive than repeated elements

suggestedFixes.fix: Increase height to 480px and show 8-10 varied log entries with realistic timestamps
suggestedFixes.rationale: More visible entries with authentic variation demonstrate genuine operational activity

suggestedFixes.fix: Move proof bar after problem/solution to reinforce credibility at decision moment
suggestedFixes.rationale: Aligns trust reinforcement with natural buyer journey progression

suggestedFixes.fix: Keep primary CTA but add small secondary option for 'View Pricing' or 'See Demo'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Accommodates different user intents while maintaining clear primary action

suggestedFixes.fix: Allow 4-5 steps if needed and use progressive disclosure for complex sub-processes
suggestedFixes.rationale: Accurate representation builds trust and sets proper expectations

suggestedFixes.fix: Reduce to 4px border-radius for more professional, enterprise-appropriate appearance
suggestedFixes.rationale: Subtle rounding maintains modern feel while appearing more business-focused

suggestedFixes.fix: Limit line length to 65ch on desktop and add responsive breakpoints for readability
suggestedFixes.rationale: Optimal line length improves scanning speed and comprehension

suggestedFixes.fix: Keep pricing comparison unified but add clear section headers for mental chunking
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains comparison efficiency while providing cognitive organization
